participants.name: Eric Mulvin
participants.title: Co Owner - Pacific Business Services and Monsoon Marketing | Call Center Solutions | Web & Video Marketing

messages.message:
Hi Brian, thanks for the connection on LinkedIn! I see you are based not too far from me in Scottsdale too! I always offer an invite for coffee or a beer to local people who connect since what's the point of connecting on LinkedIn if we can't see how we can help each other out. 

I would love to meet up for coffee or a beer if you have some time we could schedule one day. 

Thanks and have a great rest of the week,
Eric
Sure, we will probably have a good group some night this week. What are you working on?
